scripts.test:neon: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { Client } = require('pg'); const client = new Client(process.env.DATABASE_URL); client.connect().then(() => { console.log('✅ Conexão com Neon.tech OK'); client.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Erro:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
